annotation.title: NISAR L2 GUNW Product
annotation.reference_document: D-102272 NISAR NASA SDS Product Specification L2 Geocoded Unwrapped Interferogram

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/absoluteOrbitNumber
integer.annotation: Absolute orbit number

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/trackNumber
integer.annotation: Track number

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/frameNumber
integer.annotation: Frame number

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/missionId
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingCenter
string.annotation: Data processing center

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productType
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/granuleId
string.annotation: Unique granule identification name

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productVersion
string.annotation: Product version which represents the structure of the product and the science content governed by the algorithm, input data, and processing parameters

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productSpecificationVersion
string.annotation: Product specification version which represents the schema of this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction, either "Left" or "Right"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/orbitPassDirection
string.annotation: Orbit direction, either "Ascending" or "Descending"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceZeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of reference RSLC product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryZeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of secondary RSLC product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceZeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time of reference RSLC product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryZeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time of secondary RSLC product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedDatatakeId
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedObservationId
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isUrgentObservation
string.annotation: Flag indicating if observation is nominal ("False") or urgent ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/listOfFrequencies
string.annotation: List of frequency layers available in the product

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/diagnosticModeFlag
integer.annotation: Indicates if the radar operation mode is a diagnostic mode (1-2) or DBFed science (0): 0, 1, or 2

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productLevel
string.annotation: Product level. L0A: Unprocessed instrument data; L0B: Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; L1: Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and L2: Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isGeocoded
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the product data is in the radar geometry ("False") or in the map geometry ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/boundingPolygon
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representation of bounding polygon of the image

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingDateTime
string.annotation: Processing UTC date and time in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/radarBand
string.annotation: Acquired frequency band, either "L" or "S"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/instrumentName
string.annotation: Name of the instrument used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingType
string.annotation: Nominal (or) Urgent (or) Custom (or) Undefined

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isDithered
string.annotation: "True" if the pulse timing was varied (dithered) during acquisition, "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if this product is generated from reference and secondary RSLCs with different range bandwidths, "False" otherwise.

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/grids/frequencyA/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/grids/frequencyA/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed image in hertz

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/grids/frequencyA/unwrappedInterferogram/HH/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/grids/frequencyA/unwrappedInterferogram/HH/yCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive lines

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/grids/frequencyA/unwrappedInterferogram/HH/xCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive pixels

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Unwrapped interferogram between HH layers

integer.annotation: Connected components for HH layer

real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive pixels

real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive lines

real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive pixels

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/referenceSlantRange
real.annotation: Slant range of the reference RSLC in meters

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/hydrostaticTroposphericPhaseScreen
real.annotation: Hydrostatic component of the troposphere phase screen

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/wetTroposphericPhaseScreen
real.annotation: Wet component of the troposphere phase screen

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/slantRangeSolidEarthTidesPhase
real.annotation: Solid Earth tides phase along slant range direction

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/alongTrackSolidEarthTidesPhase
real.annotation: Solid Earth tides phase in along-track direction

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/referenceZeroDopplerAzimuthTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time in seconds

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/incidenceAngle
real.annotation: Incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/losUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/losUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/elevationAngle
real.annotation: Elevation angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/groundTrackVelocity
real.annotation: Absolute value of the platform velocity scaled at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/secondaryZeroDopplerAzimuthTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time of corresponding pixel in secondary image

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/secondarySlantRange
real.annotation: Slant range of corresponding pixel in secondary image

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/parallelBaseline

annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Parallel component of the InSAR baseline

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/radarGrid/perpendicularBaseline

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Perpendicular component of the InSAR baseline

real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/runConfigurationContents
string.annotation: Contents of the run configuration file with parameters used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/rfiCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if RFI correction has been applied to reference RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if reference RSLC is a composite of data collected in multiple radar modes, "False" otherwise

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference Terrain Height as a function of map coordinates for reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction for reference RSLC raster layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters / secondary/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference Terrain Height as a function of map coordinates for secondary RSLC

string.annotation: Flag to indicate if RFI correction has been applied to secondary RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters / secondary/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if secondary RSLC is a composite of data collected in multiple radar modes, "False" otherwise

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters / secondary/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters / secondary/frequencyA/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction for secondary RSLC raster layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters / secondary/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters / secondary/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters / secondary/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/dopplerBandwidth
real.annotation: Common Doppler Bandwidth used for processing interferogram

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for frequency A interferometric layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for frequency A interferometric layers

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/commonBandRangeFilterApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if common band range filter has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/commonBandAzimuthFilterApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if common band azimuth filter has been applied

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/numberOfRangeLooks
integer.annotation: Number of looks applied in the slant range direction to form the wrapped interferogram

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/numberOfAzimuthLooks
integer.annotation: Number of looks applied in the along-track direction to form the wrapped interferogram

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/ellipsoidalFlatteningApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the interferometric phase has been flattened with respect to a zero height ellipsoid

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/topographicFlatteningApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the interferometric phase has been flattened with respect to topographic height using a DEM

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/unwrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for frequency A interferometric layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/unwrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for frequency A interferometric layers

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/unwrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/commonBandRangeFilterApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if common band range filter has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/unwrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/commonBandAzimuthFilterApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if common band azimuth filter has been applied

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/unwrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/numberOfRangeLooks
integer.annotation: Number of looks applied in the slant range direction to form the unwrapped interferogram

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/unwrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/numberOfAzimuthLooks
integer.annotation: Number of looks applied in the along-track direction to form the unwrapped interferogram

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/unwrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/ellipsoidalFlatteningApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the interferometric phase has been flattened with respect to a zero height ellipsoid

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/unwrappedInterferogram/frequencyA/topographicFlatteningApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the interferometric phase has been flattened with respect to topographic height using a DEM

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/ionosphere/lowBandBandwidth
real.annotation: Slant range bandwidth of the low sub-band image

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/ionosphere/highBandBandwidth
real.annotation: Slant range bandwidth of the high sub-band image

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/rangeIonosphericCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the range ionospheric correction is applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/azimuthIonosphericCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the azimuth ionospheric correction is applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/hydrostaticTroposphericCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the hydrostatic tropospheric correction is applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/wetTroposphericCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the wet tropospheric correction is applied to improve geolocation

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/alongTrackWindowSize
integer.annotation: Along-track cross-correlation window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/slantRangeWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range cross-correlation window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/alongTrackSearchWindowSize
integer.annotation: Along-track cross-correlation search window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/slantRangeSearchWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range cross-correlation search window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/alongTrackSkipWindowSize
integer.annotation: Along-track cross-correlation skip window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/slantRangeSkipWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range cross-correlation skip window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/crossCorrelationSurfaceOversampling
integer.annotation: Oversampling factor of the cross-correlation surface

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/isOffsetsBlendingApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if pixel offsets are the results of blending multi-resolution layers of pixel offsets

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/orbit/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to position and velocity records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/orbit/position
real.annotation: Position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/orbit/velocity
real.annotation: Velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/orbit/orbitType
string.annotation: PrOE (or) NOE (or) MOE (or) POE (or) Custom

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/attitude/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/attitude/quaternions
real.annotation: Attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/attitude/eulerAngles
real.annotation: Attitude Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/attitude/attitudeType
string.annotation: PrOE (or) NOE (or) MOE (or) POE (or) Custom

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/softwareVersion
string.annotation: Software version used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/coregistrationMethod
string.annotation: RSLC coregistration method

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/geometryCoregistration
string.annotation: Geometry coregistration algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/crossCorrelation
string.annotation: Cross-correlation algorithm for sub-pixel offsets computation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/resampling
string.annotation: Secondary RSLC resampling algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/crossCorrelationOutliers
string.annotation: Outliers identification algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/crossCorrelationFilling
string.annotation: Outliers data filling algorithm for cross-correlation offsets

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/crossCorrelationFilterKernel
string.annotation: Filtering algorithm for cross-correlation offsets

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/interferogramFormation/multilooking
string.annotation: Multilooking algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/interferogramFormation/wrappedInterferogramFiltering
string.annotation: Algorithm used to filter the wrapped interferogram prior to phase unwrapping

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/interferogramFormation/flatteningMethod
string.annotation: Algorithm used to flatten the wrapped interferogram

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/unwrapping/unwrappingAlgorithm
string.annotation: Algorithm used for phase unwrapping

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/unwrapping/unwrappingInitializer
string.annotation: Algorithm used to initialize phase unwrapping

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/unwrapping/costMode
string.annotation: Cost mode algorithm for phase unwrapping

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/unwrapping/preprocessing/wrappedPhaseOutliers
string.annotation: Algorithm identifying outliers in the wrapped interferogram

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/unwrapping/preprocessing/wrappedPhaseFilling
string.annotation: Outliers data filling algorithm for phase unwrapping preprocessing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/ionosphereEstimation/ionosphereAlgorithm
string.annotation: Algorithm used to estimate ionosphere phase screen

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/ionosphereEstimation/ionosphereOutliers
string.annotation: Algorithm identifying outliers in unfiltered ionosphere phase screen

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/ionosphereEstimation/ionosphereFilling
string.annotation: Outliers data filling algorithm for ionosphere phase estimation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/ionosphereEstimation/ionosphereFiltering
string.annotation: Filtering algorithm for ionosphere phase screen computation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/ionosphereEstimation/unwrappingErrorCorrection
string.annotation: Algorithm correcting unwrapping errors in sub-band unwrapped interferograms

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding/demInterpolation
string.annotation: DEM interpolation algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding/floatingGeocodingInterpolation
string.annotation: Geocoding interpolation algorithm for floating point datasets

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding/integerGeocodingInterpolation
string.annotation: Geocoding interpolation algorithm for integer datasets

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding/complexGeocodingInterpolation
string.annotation: Geocoding interpolation algorithm for complex-valued datasets

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/l1ReferenceSlcGranules
string.annotation: List of input reference L1 RSLC products used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/l1SecondarySlcGranules
string.annotation: List of input secondary L1 RSLC products used

string.annotation: List of input orbit files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/configFiles
string.annotation: List of input config files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GUNW/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/demSource
string.annotation: Description of the input digital elevation model (DEM)

shape.annotation: Scalar values

shape.annotation: Number of L-SAR frequencies in product

shape.annotation: Number of polarization layers associated with L-SAR frequencyA

shape.annotation: Number of pixels in all L-SAR frequencyA imagery datasets

shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR frequencyA imagery datasets

shape.name: offsetLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in all L-SAR frequencyA imagery datasets

shape.annotation: Shape associated with metadata cubes

shape.annotation: Length dimension of the metadata cube

shape.annotation: Height dimension of the baseline metadata cube

shape.annotation: Length dimension of Doppler centroid grid
